text.en: Place 1 monster from your Deck face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell. You can banish this card from your GY; place 1 monster from your Deck face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Trap. You can only use 1 "White-Eye Pressure" effect per turn, and only once that turn, and can only activate them if the combined number of cards in the Monster Zone and face-up Monster Cards in the Spell & Trap Zone equals 10 or more.
